ComicInfo.Title: The Human Zoo
ComicInfo.Summary: The Human Zoo: When Buddy Baker decides to resume his superhero career, S.T.A.R. labs in San Diego calls him to investigate a break-in at a lab working to develop an AIDS vaccine.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-06 14:42:37. [CVDB30000] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 01:13:40. [Issue ID 44905]
ComicInfo.Characters: Dr. Myers,Dick Griffith,Violet Weidemeir (introduction),Mr. Miracle [Scott Free],Skip (dog),Ray,Lew,Blue Beetle [Ted Kord],Animal Man [Buddy Baker],2 other unnamed hunters,Rufus (cat),Justice League International [Captain Atom [Nathaniel Adam],Roger Denning,Cliff Baker (introduction),Morris Weidemeir (introduction),Booster Gold [Michael Carter]] (cameo,all as pictures on a magazine),Tricia Denning (introduction),B'Wana Beast,Maxine Baker (introduction),Ellen Baker
